tip_sub_pos: Select the alignment of subtitles in the video
tip_time_start: Specify the starting time to begin processing.
tip_time_end: Specify the ending time to stop processing.
tip_conf_threshold: Minimum confidence score for detected text.
tip_sim_threshold: Threshold for merging text lines based on content similarity.
tip_merge_gap: Maximum allowed time gap to merge similar subtitles.
tip_brightness:
Applies a brightness filter before OCR.
Pixels below the threshold are blacked out. Leave empty to disable.
tip_ssim:
If the SSIM between frames exceeds this threshold,
the frame is considered similar and skipped for OCR.
tip_ocr_width:
Maximum image width for OCR. Larger images are scaled
down to this width to improve performance. Set to 0 to disable.
tip_frames_skip:
Process every Nth frame (e.g., 1 = every 2nd).
Higher = faster but less accurate, lower = slower but more accurate.
tip_min_duration: Detected subtitles below this duration are omitted from the SRT file.
chk_use_gpu: Enable GPU Usage (Only affects GPU version)
tip_use_gpu: Attempt to use the GPU for OCR processing if available and supported.
tip_full_frame: Process the entire video frame instead of using a crop box.
tip_dual_zone: Allows selecting two separate crop boxes for OCR.
tip_angle_cls: Detect and correct rotated text angles.
tip_post_processing:
Checks the OCR result for missing spaces and tries to insert them automatically.
Does not support all languages, more info can be found online.
tip_server_model:
Enables the server model with higher OCR capabilities.
This mode can deliver better results but requires also more computing power.
A GPU is highly recommended when using this mode.
tip_save_crop_box:
If checked, the crop box will be saved as a
relative position and restored for the next video/session.
tip_save_in_video_dir:
Save the output SRT file in the same directory as the video file.
If enabled, "Output directory" is disabled.
tip_output_dir:
Folder where generated SRT files will be placed.
Disabled when "Save SRT in Video Directory" is enabled.
tip_seek_step: Number of frames to jump when using Left/Right arrows.
tip_send_notification: Send notification when the process is complete.
tip_check_updates: Automatically check for new versions of VideOCR when the application starts.
lbl_bug_report: Found a bug or have a suggestion? Feel free to open an issue at:
help_message:
Draw a crop box over the subtitle region in the video.
Use click+drag to select.
In 'Dual Zone' mode, you can draw two crop boxes.
If no crop box is selected, the bottom third of the video
will be used for OCR by default.
